        public java.lang.String getISO(java.lang.String s)
        Gives the first three letter back Example EUR - Euro -> return EUR If EUR dosnt match [A-Z]{3} return EUR
        Parameters:
        s - the given sting
        Returns:
        EUR if wrong spelling
